lead_paragraph: Lionel Messi returned to training on Monday after recovering from a stomach bug that caused him to miss Barcelona's goalless draw against Malaga on Saturday.

headline.print_headline: Messi Boost for Barcelona Ahead of Celtic Game
headline.main: Messi Boost for Barcelona Ahead of Celtic Game
